text: Kiya tum apni sirgoshi say pehlay sadqa nikalney say darr gaye? Pus jab tum ney na kiya aur Allah Taalaa ney bhi tumhen moaf farma diya to abb (ba khoobi) namazon ko qaeem rakho zakat detay raha kero aur Allah Taalaa ki aur uss kay rasool ki tabey daari kertay raho iss (sab) say Allah (khoob) khabardaar hai
